author: rahuL islam
text: 'Not relevant whiskey collection'

author: Landy216
text: 'Went to this place on a recent visit to Jersey. The young bearded man recommended a wine and beer that were excellent. Great customer service

author: Justin Acker
text: 'Excellent selection of beers and wines plus friendly service!'

author: angela santana
text: 'I visited the shop today and had the best experience; in spite of the fact
column5: that they did not have the wine I was looking for.  Nevertheless
column6: the owner endeavored to research the wine I wanted and promised to order it
column7: if I decide to go back and purchase it.'

author: Ginette B
text: "They have the super-sized Espolon that I can't find anywhere else."

author: Pavel Stepanov
text: 'The people there are very helpful and nice.'

author: Rajiv Katara
text: 'Great service and selection! The staff is extremely helpful and knowledgeable!'

author: Western Direct
text: 'Joe is extremely helpful and a very nice person. The overall staff is great.'

author: Lisa Nastawa
text: 'This place is great
column6: they are always so happy to welcome my pup when I stop by!'

author: Xinrou Tan
text: "Always our go to for wine and liquor. They have a wide selection of all kinds of wine
column6: and liquor. Their prices are fair and they sometimes have special offers for buying more. The people working there are always very helpful whenever I'm there. They carry a lot of locally produced products

author: Law rah
text: 'Amazing selection and super friendly staff! My favorite!'

author: mike garcia
text: 'I made a mistake last rating meant to do a 4 star'

author: shtetlg
text: 'Nice place.  Staff is friendly.  They used to have tastings and samples before covid hit... Hopefully that can happen again.'

author: Adam Wit
text: 'People working here are superstars.'

author: Maria Regina
text: 'they are great at recommending new wines to try

author: Jonathan Pepe
text: "Unique selection of wines
column6: and spirits. Usually the first place I look for something high-end or obscure. If they don't have it's they can order it... Very knowledgeable staff. Free delivery in Hoboken

author: Sanjay Merchant
text: 'Good wines helpful and knowledgeable owner with good and friendly recommendations'

author: sushmanth vaibhav
text: 'Allison here is awesome! She has some great recommendations for red wine enthusiasts
column5: she’s very friendly and helpful while I visited the store
column7: but if I happen to drive by
column8: I will sure visit the store and ask for Allison :)\nI will also give her a call for any good suggestions for my next wine adventure!'

author: Gabriella Yitzhaek
text: 'We always have a wonderful experience at Wine Dad’s
column5: but today’s was particularly great hence the review. The staff is always friendly and very knowledgeable. Jeff was extremely helpful (and really knows his stuff) and assisted us in picking a delicious bottle and Diana was great in the checkout process!'

author: Felicity Barber
text: 'Love this place - great recommendations for affordable wines and beer if you ask the staff.'

author: Kyle Englishman
text: "This place is amazing. I highly recommend shopping here. It's a small store
column5: but they carry a really wide selection. Don't let the name fool you; they carry far more than just wine. They have beer
column8: and mixers. The staff are all incredibly helpful. They've given me some great recommendations for things I wouldn't have found on my own

author: Bianca Sampang
text: 'love this place! they are always so nice .. we have been getting delivery since the quarantine started and they always come right away!'

author: Cj Ninebot
text: 'Place is a complete joke
column5: they list stuff online and can’t update
column6: good places would still Deliver the other items not ask me to add mote to the order
column8: very bad management and customer service'

author: Brian Quinones
text: 'Great selection of wine and beer.  Staff are knowledgeable about the various wines and beers that they carry and are more than willing to assist you with your needs.  Very limited stock of cognac though.'

author: Nicole Guilbault
text: "Love this place. We came in to find natural wines
column5: most places don't carry a true natural wine. They had a large selection of them and the man that helped us was very knowledgeable about seemingly everything. They offer the right amount of help without constantly being in your face. Lovely place with reasonable prices. They have a lot of local stuff as well."

author: The Kiara Nicole Way
text: 'I’m from Maryland and was visiting New Jersey for the weekend. This liquor store was near my Air BnB and they were so hospitable and knowledgeable. They helped my friend and I pick out an ale and red wine that definitely did the trick for the night! I didn’t catch the names of the associates but thank you guys so much! Actually on my way back right now lol'

author: Kyle Douglas Harrison
text: 'Best liquor store in Hoboken
column5: maybe on earth. Wine Dad is an absolute legend.'

author: Daniela Velasquez
text: 'Friendly and knowledgeable service
column5: great selection of beers (locals and imports) only thing they are missing is delivery

author: Tom Doody
text: '“Milk won’t solve your problems NIETHER alcohol  will solve your spelling”'

author: Chanel Flores
text: 'I stopped in on a Friday afternoon
column5: the owner was thorough in helping me choose three natural wines for a dinner party. Wine "snobs" or not
column6: my guests were very impressed! Great prices
column8: and exceptional quality wines. Highly recommend. :)'

author: Kevin O'Rourke
text: 'Great hand selected single barrels available in the store!'

author: Pablo Neira
text: "The best selection of craft beers in Hoboken or north Jersey with no doubt you can found a large variety of trappist abbeys beers from Belgium la trapper
column6: 6 en regular one just  take your time and go over there the stuff it's very nice and they know a lot about what the are selling."

author: Matthew Benny
text: 'Aside from a solid beer selection
column5: probably the nicest group of people you’ll come across.'

author: Edouard Baudoin
text: 'Best place in Hoboken for your booze. Friendly staff - very good advice
column5: going there on a regular basis'

author: Chance Scheffing
text: 'Super stAnd up shop! Selection of wine is amazing!'

author: Róbert Busa-Fekete
text: 'Cool staff! good selection of beers'

author: Chris Himes
text: 'Friendly staff-- very attentive and knowledgeable-- great addition to the neighborhood!'

author: Adam W.
text: 'I am down with the new store. Staff is super attentive. Maybe a bit too much if that is possible but I understand their enthusiasm. The store is great. So much to choose from. Prices are excellent. Really excellent and worth the extra few blocks for me.'

author: Hannah Han
text: 'Great store. Nice staff.'

author: Alan Flade
text: "Great Store!  Great Location!  Great Selection!  Owner's are awesome and very knowledgeable."
